title: Coronation Street spoilers: Shona dumps David after he murders Josh in stabbing?
text:
Shona makes a shocking discovery thanks to Max (Picture: ITV)

David Platt (Jack P Shepherd) and Shona Ramsey (Julia Goulding) have been through a lot in Coronation Street together, and yet they’ve always managed to come out the other end stronger than ever. However, as rapist Josh Tucker (Ryan Clayton) gets stabbed during a prison riot — and David becomes the prime suspect in the investigation into the incident — will Shona perhaps decide that enough is enough?

In the coming episodes, a riot breaks out at the prison where David is currently serving his sentence. Determined to stay out of the action, David retreats to his cell, but Abe takes advantage of the commotion and drags Josh into the young man’s room, before handing him a pair of scissors and telling him to do as he pleases with his rapist.

David later tells Abe that he wants to deal with Josh alone — will he exact violent revenge?

Meanwhile, Shona (Julia Goulding) is horrified when the riot is shown on the news, but her mind is put at ease when David phones her later — that is, until she learns that Josh has been stabbed.

Before hanging up, David pleads with his girlfriend to get him a lawyer.

David denies any involvement in the attack, swearing to Shona that he had no part in it. However, Max later stumbles upon a video of the riot — during which Josh can be seen collapsing to the floor as a result of a stab wound. What’s worse is that David can be seen nearby.

Upon hearing that Max has seen the video, David is horrified, but he continues to profess his innocence — but Shona’s unsure what to believe.

Will this incident spell the end of David and Shona’ relationship?

Shona clearly has her doubts about her boyfriend’s innocence, that’s for sure.

One to watch: Wednesday 23rd October at 8:30pm on ITV.
